parameters.name: numDiffItem
parameters.description: Number of different trials with item substitution

parameters.name: numDiffOrder
parameters.description: Number of different trials with order swap

parameters.name: stimsize
parameters.description: Stimulus size.  stimulus set must have enough to cover these

parameters.name: prestime
parameters.description: Presentation time, in ms, of stimulus

parameters.name: delaytime
parameters.description: Delay time, in ms, between stimulus disappearing and response probe.
